changelog.metadescription: KoolTabs - Powerful PHP Tab Menu - Fast rendering, Flexible CSS Style and Search Engine Friendly make KoolTabs the great PHP Tab Menu solution for your website navigation system.
changelog.metakeywords: php tab, php tab menu, php tabstrip, ajax tab menu
changelog.log: - Fix client-side conflict with MooTools framework.

- New client-side function: addTab() - New client-side function: removeTab() - New client-side function: getSelectedChain() - New client-side function: getParentId() - New client-side function: getChildIds() - New client-side function: moveToFront() - New client-side function: moveToBehind() - New style added: Silver - Enhancement: Select tab when KoolTabs is in bottom position
- Adding template for style of KoolTabs' item. This will make KoolTabs more flexible in changing appearance.
- First version of KoolTabs has been released - Multi-level tabs capability is included - Scrolling capaibity is included - Tab alignment capability is included
